General.Name: Spartoo SAS
General.Description: SPARTOO SAS operates as an online retailer for fashion items in Europe. It offers shoes, bags, clothes, watch, jewelry, beauty, underwear, and other accessories. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Grenoble, France.

1.Name: Mr. Paul  Lorne
1.Title: Co-Founder, Head of Supply Chain & Deputy CEO
